prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the essence of the universe with ethereal colors.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with a majestic design and an aura of mystery around it.
Imagine a Pokemon that can control time and space with elegant features and a celestial theme.
Design a Pokemon that represents creation, featuring intricate patterns and a divine appearance.
Give me a unique Pokemon that can change forms with a variety of colors and elegant shapes.
Generate a legendary creature that has a balance of power and grace, with a bright white body.
Make a Pokemon with the ability to evolve into different types, showcasing its versatility and beauty.
